quests.name: Handle with Care
objectives: Follow Snow White to the entrance of the Ranch.
Progress in the "Ghost Town" quest to unlock the bridge.

Gather resources to repair the Careblossom Topiary.
  ‧ 12 Dry Wood.
  ‧ 8 Rusty Hinges.
  ‧ 10 Pebbles.
  ‧ 2 Pyrite.

Interact with the Careblossom Topiary to repair it.
  ‧ You'll need 12 Dry Wood, 8 Rusty Hinges, 10 Pebbles, and 2 Pyrite.
Talk to Snow White.

Gather resources to build your Blooming Rock Gardens.
  ‧ 5 Pink Crocus.
  ‧ 4 Purple Crocus.
  ‧ 2 Yellow Crocus.
  ‧ 15 Reclaimed Barn Wood.
Craft 4 Blooming Rock Gardens.
Place the Blooming Rock Gardens around the Careblossom Topiary.
Talk to Snow White.
Dress your horse with Snow White's Saddle
Take a picture of your horse in Snow White's Saddle.
Talk to Snow White.

Care for your horse to summon sparks.
  ‧ In a single day, feed your horse its three favorite daily meals, brush it, and pet it.
Check on the Careblossom Topiary near the entrance to the Wishblossom Ranch.

quests.name: Making Peace
objectives: Make sure you have Snow White's pie in your Inventory.
Bring the pie to Cruella.
Talk to Snow White.

Gather materials to make the Horse Plushie Friend.
  ‧ 3 Black Silk Flower.
  ‧ 10 Sequin Strands.
  ‧ 3 Measuring-Tape Snail.
Craft a Horse Plushie Friend for Cruella.
Place the Horse Plushie Friend near Cruella De Vil's House.
Talk to Cruella.
Talk to Snow White.

Gather Ingredients to cook Natural Cloak Dye.
  ‧ Beetroot.
  ‧ Scarlet Kale.
  ‧ Pincushion Peach.
Cook the Natural Cloak Dye for Snow White.
Make sure you have the Natural Cloak Dye in your Inventory.
Bring the Natural Cloak Dye to Snow White.
Make sure you have the Fairly Fashionable Cloak in your Inventory.
Bring the Fairly Fashionable Cloak to Cruella.
Check in with Snow White.

Gather materials to repair the Destroyed Fairly Fashionable Cloak.
  ‧ 5 Pearly Barley.
  ‧ 5 Button Mushroom.
  ‧ 20 Pixie Dust.
Repair the Destroyed Fairly Fashionable Cloak.
Dress up with the Fairly Fashionable Cloak to cheer up Snow White.
Talk to Snow White.
Check on the Careblossom Topiary at the entrance to Wishblossom Ranch.

quests.name: The Copycat
objectives: Visit Cruella De Vil's House.
Talk to Cruella in her house.
Exit Cruella De Vil's House.
Talk to Snow White about the meeting at Cruella's House.
Talk to Olaf about Cruella's plans.
Gather Wire Coat Hangers by fishing outside of ripples in Glamour Gulch
Bring the Wire Coat Hangers to Olaf.
Talk to WALL-E about Cruella's plans.
Mine for Antique Clothes Irons in Glamour Gulch (or grab them from your storage!)
Bring the Antique Clothes Irons to WALL-E.
Talk to Snow White about what you learned of Cruella's plans.
Talk to Snow White inside Cruella De Vil's House.
Take a picture of one of the mannequins wearing the copycat cloaks in Cruella's House.
Leave Cruella De Vil's House.
Confront Cruella about her copycat cloak production.
Talk to Snow White about the Copycat Horse Blankets.
Dress up your Wishblossom Horse with the Copycat Horse Blanket.
Talk to Cruella.

Your act of kindness for Snow White has made something happen!
  ‧ Check on the Careblossom Topiary at the entrance to Wishblossom Ranch.

quests.name: The Wishblossom Fair
objectives:
Bring Wishblossom Fair invitations to competition judges:
  ‧ Tiana.
  ‧ Daisy.
  ‧ Mulan.
Talk to Snow White.

Decorate the Ranch grounds with:
  ‧ 3 Wishblossom Fair Table.
  ‧ 8 Alpine Lampposts.
Dress up in red, blue, or white clothing.
Talk to Snow White.

Complete all activities at the Wishblossom Fair:
  ‧ The Cooking Competition.
  ‧ The Horse Beauty Contest.
  ‧ The Riding Demonstration.
Talk to Snow White.
Return to the Careblossom Topiary at the entrance to Wishblossom Ranch.

All of the Careblossoms are dead? Again?!
  ‧ Talk to Snow White.
Only one Villager could have done this... Talk to Cruella.
Talk to Tinker Bell about the ruined Careblossom Topiary.
Water the Careblossom Topiary.
Place the Wishblossom Fair Trophy close to the restored Careblossom Topiary.
Take a picture with the Wishblossom Fair guests.
Talk to Snow White.

quests.name: Hold Your Horses: The Wishing Alps
objectives:
Gather the materials needed to craft the Wishing Alps Stable Repair Kit:
  ‧ 10 Reclaimed Barn Wood.
  ‧ 10 Pixie Dust.
  ‧ 5 Yellow Crocus.
  ‧ 2 Shiny Pyrite.
Craft the Wishing Alps Stable Repair Kit.
Use the sign beside the Stables to unlock a new stall with the Wishing Alps Stable Repair Kit.

quests.name: Hold Your Horses: Glamour Gulch
objectives:
Gather the materials needed to craft the Glamour Gulch Stable Repair Kit:
  ‧ 20 Sequin Strands.
  ‧ 20 Pixie Dust.
  ‧ 10 Green Silk Flower.
  ‧ 4 Shiny Jasper.
Craft the Glamour Gulch Stable Repair Kit.
Use the sign beside the Stables to unlock a new stall with the Glamour Gulch Stable Repair Kit.

quests.name: Hold Your Horses: Pixie Acres
objectives:
Gather the materials needed to craft the Pixie Acres Stable Repair Kit:
  ‧ 30 Copter Seeds.
  ‧ 30 Pixie Dust.
  ‧ 15 Yellow Lily of the Valley.
  ‧ 6 Shiny Honeycomb Stone.
Craft the Pixie Acres Stable Repair Kit.
Use the sign beside the Stables to unlock a new stall with the Stable Repair Kit.
